Software name:                           FatFs
Brief:                                   FatFs is a generic FAT file system module for small embedded systems.
Path:                                    mcu/middleware/third_party/fatfs
Category:                                Open source software(OSS)
Software maker:                          ChaN
OSS download link:                       http://elm-chan.org/fsw/ff/00index_e.html
License:                                 BSD-style license
Evidence of license agreement:           http://elm-chan.org/fsw/ff/doc/appnote.html#license
Version:                                 R0.14b
